https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h9ebayCB7FxKYRrIxfW36fZifmC.jpg A modern girl moves to a new school and is bullied. She throws a page from her journal into a hollow tree, and a monk from medieval England receives it. They begin a correspondence through time to help each other. A Message Through Time
